bde843bcd38d1dd7011f366a2f743977: Knowledge management is essentially about getting the right knowledge to the right person at the right time. Knowledge management may also include new knowledge creation, or it may solely focus on knowledge sharing, storage, and refinement. The overall objective is to create value and leverage and refine the firm's knowledge assets to meet organizational goals. Implementing knowledge management thus has several dimensions including: Strategy, Organizational Culture, Organizational Processes, and Management & Leadership.

58f979150c485f6fe4c978aef84be180: AI transforms knowledge management by automating content categorization, improving search accuracy, and generating actionable insights from vast data pools. 95d417c7ec4af76a103c23f55160184c: 97% say that effective knowledge management is a key driver for competitive advantage.
966f11ecc5ab1ea1a696e1c2751fe3b0:
Knowledge management is very important in the AI era. Organizations recognize knowledge as a strategic asset (Local Source 1). 97% of decision makers and executives say that effective knowledge management is a key driver for competitive advantage, and 92% believe access to up-to-date, reliable knowledge unlocks significant value for their business (Local Source 1). 

Businesses are integrating AI into their knowledge management processes, with real value emerging when AI is integrated into daily workflows (Local Source 1). AI-powered tools make knowledge searchable, accessible, and usable across the business (Local Source 2). 

56% of organizations are using AI for knowledge management (Local Source 3). Business leaders predict that using AI to manage organizational knowledge could lead to greater productivity, less time spent on repetitive tasks, faster and more informed decision making, and stronger collaboration across teams (Local Source 2).
